summary.Title: Cleaning staff for Grillen Burgerbar
summary.Presentation: Do you love to clean and are you motivated by completing a task to perfection? Do you value flexibility in your work schedule? Then it might be you that we are looking for to clean our restaurant i

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you love to clean and are you motivated by completing a task to perfection? Do you value flexibility in your work schedule? Then it might be you that we are looking for to clean our restaurant in Vejle!

You will become a part of a burger restaurant chain which at the moment consists of 8 restaurants in Denmark with plans of opening more in the future. Our team is young and they love to create great experiences for our guests. Your job will be to ensure that we maintain our high standards for cleaning and hygiene at Grillen Burgerbar. This includes cleaning in a flexible job, where you have able to choose when you do the hours, as long as the work is done in time.

About the job:

You will become part of a team of 2-3 people, who will make sure that the restaurant always presents neat and clean before we open. Our restaurants are cleaned on a daily basis for 2 hours, but the work can be planned to your needs with consideration of the restaurant opening hours – so work has to be done in the period from when we close to when we open up again the following day.

The job will be a routine based job where you will work independently anchored in the daily check lists and the occasional directions given to you by e.g. the Restaurant Manager.

About you:

We take honor in ensuring that our restaurants are clean and tidy. So you must be able to take responsibility for the cleaning and ensure, that it’s always done in accordance to current standards. You thrive on working independently within a given framework and you must really be dedicated to what you do because you are motivated by results and contributing to a team and a great environment for guests and colleagues. You aren’t afraid to get your hands dirty and in addition to that you are detail oriented and don’t compromise on tidiness and cleaning.

We offer:

  • Being a part of a company in growth with a strong culture in a young team

  • Fair pay and staff benefits

  • Flexible schedules dependent on the restaurant opening hours

  • 4-14 hours depending on your wishes

  • The possibility of growing within the company and getting more responsibility

  • Close sparring with restaurants

Does this sounds good to you? Don’t hesitate to send us an application as a PDF as soon as possible for teamvejle@grillenburgerbar.dk. Subject: “Clean”. We will recruit on an ongoing basis.
